info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 30 at 2:39PM CST until January 02 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY MORNING THROUGH SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation possible. Total snow and sleet accumulations up to one to two inches and ice accumulations up to one tenth of an inch possible. Temperatures will fall rapidly on Saturday, leading to quickly changing road conditions and possibly a flash freeze on roads and other surfaces. * WHERE...Portions of southeast Kansas. portions of central and west central Missouri. * WHEN...From Saturday morning through Saturday evening. * IMPACTS...Roads, and especially bridges and overpasses, will likely become slick and hazardous. Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Additional light snowfall is possible Saturday night that may lead to slippery conditions.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
